doc:
Frank Craven https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frank_Craven 0 Frank Craven (24 August 1875 – 1 September 1945) was an American stage and film actor, playwright, and screenwriter, best known for originating the role of the Stage Manager in Thornton Wilder's Our Town. Frank_Craven ( 24_August_1875 – 1_September_1945 ) was an_American_stage_and_film_actor , playwright , and screenwriter , best_known for originating the_role of the_Stage_Manager in Thornton_Wilder 's_Our_Town .
